event-group.description: These are canvas scaling functions for use of convience. The tutorial has numerous calls and use for canvas scale and it's just easier. Your projects may not need this as a function and can embed the code.
event-group.title: Functions

event-group.description: Controls for a static(non-moving) analog control joystick. This model is meant to simulate arcade like controls in a touch environment. Useful for providing "tapping" based controls. [note: onStart is not required with proper placement and defined radius]
event-group.title: Joystick

action.name: Set value
action.param: distance(JoystickArea.X, JoystickArea.Y, Function.Call("ScaleX", TouchID), Function.Call("ScaleY", TouchID))

action.name: Set value
action.param: angle(JoystickArea.X, JoystickArea.Y, Function.Call("ScaleX", TouchID), Function.Call("ScaleY", TouchID) )
